Title: Your Best Year Ever, Chapter 14: Visibility is Essential
Description:
This is the 14th chapter from Michael's revised and updated best-selling book, Your Best Year Ever. Over the couple of weeks, we'll be releasing a few chapters a week so that you can be prepared for 2024 to be your Best Year Ever.

If you want to read or listen to the entire book today, then visit www.yourbestyeareverbook.com and pick up a copy. After buying the book, make sure to sign up for your FREE ticket to Your Best Year Ever Live (a $197 value!).

In this chapter, Michael Hyatt discusses the importance of regularly reviewing our goals and breaking them down into actionable steps. He highlights the significance of daily and weekly horizons for maintaining focus and utilizing tools like the Full Focus Planner.

Want the rest of the book now? Make sure to visit www.yourbestyeareverbook.com.
